source.sourceEntry: Evesham Monthly Meeting First Book of Marriages, via Ancestry.com search, January 20, 2021

descriptiveNote.p: p. 10. William Rodgers son of William Rodgers Deceased of Evesham and Sarah Warrington daughter of Henry Warrington of Chester were married the seventh day of the third month for the year of our Lord one thousand seven hundred fifty four.

source.sourceEntry: Evesham Monthly Meeting First Book of Marriages, via Ancestry.com search, January 20, 2021

descriptiveNote.p: p. 47. William Rogers of the Township of Evesham and Grace Ayres widow and relict of Nerr Eayres deceased of the town aforesaid were married the 14th day of the 5th month 1767.

source.sourceEntry: First Record Book of Births and Deaths of Members of Evesham Monthly Meeting, via Ancestry.com search, January 20, 2021

descriptiveNote.p: p. 25. William Rogers, Son of William Rogers and Ann his Wife, Born the 21st of the 7th Month 1731, and Grace his Wife, Daughter of Matthew and Martha Allen, born the 6th of the 10th month 1741. Grace Rogers Departed this Life the 24th of the 9th Month 1807 in the 66 year of her Age.

source.sourceEntry: Evesham Monthly Meeting First Book of Marriages, via Ancestry.com search, January 20, 2021

descriptiveNote.p: p. 20. Nerr Ayre son of Richard Ayre of the township of Evesham and Grace Allin daughter of Matthew Allin of the same place were married the seventeenth day of the 3d month 1763.

source.sourceEntry: Second Record Book of Births and Deaths of Members of Evesham Monthly Meeting, via Ancestry.com search, January 20, 2021

descriptiveNote.p: p. 2. William Rogers, born 2nd of 7th month 1731; son of William Rogers; resident of Evesham Township; married to Grace Rogers, daughter of Matthew Allen; father of William Rogers (1768-1824), Joseph Rogers (1770-), Grace Rogers (1771-), Hannah Rogers (1773-), Ann Rogers (1776-), and Allen Rogers (1779-1800); died 5th of 12th month 1812; buried in Friends ground in Evesham.

biogHist.p: William Rogers was a New Jersey Quaker born to William and Ann Rogers in 1831. In 1754 he married Sarah Warrington, daughter of Henry Warrington. After her death Rogers remarried in 1767, this time to the recently widowed Grace Eayre (n√©e Allen). He died in early December 1812 and was buried at Evesham, New Jersey.
